name: Deals to Die For (DEMO!)
description:
Deals to Die For - A part of WWUJAM XI

You are k, a scavenger from the old village of Kaymartia. Your village elder has sent you out to bring piece to the warring factions of Fernview Mall with her dying breaths. Fulfill her last wish by uniting the food, fashion, and futuristic tech territories of the mall, so that you may fend off the incoming Ikea forces!

----------------------------------------------------------------------

The theme for this jam was dystopian K-Mart; we ran with it!

Punkitt (Mason Saulsbury) - Graphics, Assembly, Writing

KKMowshi (Cathy D'Anna) - Character Art, Graphics

Connor Castle - Management, Voice Acting :0

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

ATTENTION! YOU NEED THE RPGMAKER VX ACE RTP BEFORE YOU CAN PLAY THIS GAME! WITHOUT IT, IT WILL NOT RUN! DOWNLOAD IT HERE AND INSTALL BEFORE PLAYING

http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages

You'll also need the Pixelade Font to get the text to display correctly!!

https://www.dafont.com/pixelade.font

okay have fun <3
